title: Ruby
description: Master your Ruby skills and increase your Rails street cred by learning to build dynamic, sustainable applications for the web.

courses.descriptionCourse: Once you understand the basics of Ruby, learning more about the language will help you write better Ruby code and, therefore, better software. These courses give an overview of some of the most important parts of the Ruby programming language.

course.courseDescription: Learn the core bits every Ruby programmer should know.
Learn the advanced bits of expert Ruby programming.
